content.detailedDescription:
Odd sighting.
3/14/2015 9:55 pm (mst) i saw what i looked like an aircraft that i would describe as most closely resembling a b1 bomber with its wings extended.  what was completely abnormal was there were no lights whatsoever.  in about eight places along the fuselage and the wings there was a very odd greyish glow, similar to some type of light but not lights.
it was about 1500 to 2000 feet up, traveling at about 250 knots airspeed, traveling on a heading of about 015 degrees at 6 miles sse from the south end of the runway of hill afb utah, a clear calm moonless night.  (my location in 2 miles south and 4 miles west of the south end of the runway at hill afb) this is not a normal approach to hill afb, we heard no noise but the jets in the hot tub were running, as soon as we could shut them off only normal surface traffic noise could be heard.  other aircraft going into hill afb can usually be heard over the jets in the hot tube.  normally aircraft approaching hill afb would be 500 to 1000 feet higher and 4 miles further east.
i have a lifetime of observing aircraft, i have worked on active flying aircraft for 20 years, 10 years with boeing experimental flight test.  i have never observed any low flying aircraft with absolutely no lights and i have never seen the odd greyish glow on anything so have no further description or comparison.
it was odd and un-nerving and immediately ended our time in the hot tub and send us in to the house for the evening.
content.summary: Odd low flying aircraft with no lights, some translucent appearance.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the store in madison wisconsin when i noticed 2 objects in the sky that had a reflective reddish orange color. i very quickly realized i was seeing something unique and unusual. i pulled out my phone and recorded a 10 sec video.It was there in the sky and it was gone from the sky.Thinking this has to be something explainable i reviewed what i recorded. the video is so fast that you have to slow down the video by 50% and go frame by frame. that is when i saw this object take different shapes and move beyond any speed i've ever seen.I would like someone to see the video and the pics i got after slowing down the video and i saw cleary something unusual. so i zoomed into the video and got some amazing pictures and plus i have it on video.
content.summary: Driving to the store when i noticed 2 reddish orange objects in the sky that seemed out of place. pulled out my phone and got a 10sec video

content.detailedDescription: I was innocently running through a back road quite close to an open field, minding my own business, when i looked up at the sky and saw a green and flashing red thing flying in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane, but it was silent and way too bright to be anything. it made me a little confused because i couldn't explain what it was. i was considering taking a picture and calling my sister to come meet me, because i was quite scared. as a took a turn to get back onto the main road, it seemed to get closer. it seemed oddly close and very bright. half was solid greed and the other half was flashing red. i was half expecting it to send down an orb to pick me up. since i was alone, it seemed like the perfect time to abduct me, but i ran faster because of that. after a few minutes of fast running, i stopped and looked around. it was no where to be seen. after about a minute, it reappeared. i sprinted home after that. when i got to my door, i couldn't see it anymore. like it never happened. but it did. and it was quite scary.
content.summary: Witnessed sphere-shaped, blinking object while out running in regina

content.detailedDescription: I was at my blacony taking a pic of the view and didnt notice the object, it was when i posted to my fb that i saw the violet cloud with the lights, i went out again and didnt see anything until i pointed my phone camera to where it was just to see the object moving wuickly to the left (east direction) and didnt catch it again on the camera. its weird because i took 3 pictures and it appeared on the first, then moved the camera to the other side and took a second pic and then came back to the same place and it doesnt appear on the third picture but when i noticed it after posting the pictures i went back to the balcony and didnt see anything until i pointed my phone camera to where it was just to see the object moving wuickly to the left as i said before.Im including the third pic i took (in a row) where there is no object, but again when i came back i saw it again leaving.
content.summary: Like a violet cloud with three lights
content.locationName: Buenos Aires, Autonomous City of Buenos Aires

content.detailedDescription: On a quiet summer night my girlfriend and i were gazing at the stars and ocean at the back of her house directly facing the atlantic ocean in arecibo puerto rico 1977.  i saw what appeared to be a ship on the ocean approached by another ship coming in opposite direction right towards the first ship. when these two supposed ships merged neither one pased the other but merged as a single light which i commented to my girlfriend that at 3 in the morning this was very strange. they couldnt be talking out in that dark ocean at that hour. seconds later that light began to levitate and hover. i told my girlfriend this could not obviously be a boat or a helicopter. it seemed suspended in mid air. sudennly as it rose straight up high in the sky about 50 or 60 lights that looked like stars surrounded it and hovered for maybe 10 or 15 seconds when i was treated to a sight i will never forget. allthe objects ufos fled to the east and west and some straight up going due north at speeds which left a blur momentarily in their wake.They cross the entire night sky at supersonic speeds unheard of by our fastest jets even by todays standards. i immediately said to myself they must be at least 100 years ahead of us technologically speaking.The whole time i fely as if something were watching me. never have had the courage to report this but somehow i feel i should. the girl with me that evening has since passed but she at the time was in agreement with me that those were alien craft and must have some kind of underwaterbase as they seemed very comfortable on water as well as the sky.
content.summary: Light on ocean elevated hovered then was surrounded by 50 or more objects flew away at astounding speeds in all directions

content.detailedDescription: My wife was outside having a cigarette and looked up because it was kind of hard to miss then she called me outside to look and see what i think it might be then i saw it move slowly and kinda picked up a lil speed, it was black and round and seemed to kind of change from circle to diamond and looked to me as if was rotating, is it flew over i took some photos and a video and then watched it from the back yard but then soon disappeared and lost sight.. but this wasn't our first sighting.. a few weeks back we saw 3 glowing lights out in the distance, thot it might be a plane but like an hour later they were still there and they pulsated a white light then would dim out and disappear then re appear again..
content.summary: Black circular object seemed to kind of change shape to diamond while hovering slowly

content.detailedDescription:
While preparing to attend my daughters first communion we stopped in our driveway to take commemorative photos. nothing seemed unusual at the time. after the photos were taken i went to start the car and it would not start. i checked my watch to see what time it was and it had stopped. seemed just like a coincidence. we left in a different car and the rest of the day seemed normal also aside from feeling queasy . when we returned home the car started right up and my watch started working about 1 hour after it had stopped.

a couple of days later we had the film developed only to find this strange translucent oddly shaped anomaly present in both the picture and negative directly above my daughters head. being a professional photographer it was unlike anything i had ever seen. i did considerable investigation and follow up initially including contacting the film manufacturer and consultation with several professionals only to find more questions than answers.

i have had the film analysed and the results found were not consistent with what would be expected given any of the possible suspected causes of the anomaly. the physical proof is not rationally explainable.

in short every professional spoken with and my own education regarding this gives the same conclusion. it makes no sense and should not be possible.

later that day i felt ill (nauseous) for quite some time and i had a hard time concentrating. after seeing the photo i no longer believe the problem with the car and my watch was just a coincidence. also from that point forward my daughter developed exceptional artistic skills and is now in one of the finest art programs in the nation.

there is much i can explain about why this is unusual and the proof regarding that but it is best done in conversation rather than writing as it is quite complicated. 

i have the original pictures and negatives from this incident but do not wish to send them via the web. i would be glad to provide them for inspection and/or analysis. i have attached a drawing of what the object looks like. this has troubled me for years and i would like to get as much info about this as i now possibly can. please help.

my wife believes this is a matter of faith, but i am more sceptical. we initially contacted her local priest who put us in touch with the cardinal. the cardinal after seeing the picture and requesting a copy, later requested that the original picture and negatives be submitted to the vatican for further analysis. when asked if we would get them returned he said that was not possible so we kept them.
content.summary: Unexplained object appears in photo discovered upon development of film.

content.detailedDescription: Ref case # 63949 same order that i took the pintures from my iphone
content.summary: Ref case # 63949

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside into the back yard at around 9:45pm when i noticed a bright blue flourescent colored sphere in the north sky and was flying erratically in a north easterly direction. the object was flying relatively low but there was no sound of a propulsion source. i noticed the object make several short changes in flight path which made for an erratic pattern of flight. i called to my wife who was in the back room of our house to come see this beautiful looking blue light in the sky. in the time that my wife took to step out of the house which was approximately 45-50 seconds the light had traveled a considerable distance. she was able to make out the light seconds before it disappeared. the objects bright blue almost flourescent color was what initially caught my eye and was different than anything i have ever seen before. the bright color of the sphere plus the fact that it made no noise was also very strange. the sphere's flight pattern was erratic and made several changes in flight path as it traveled, unlike an airplane or helicopter? i felt that what i was witnessing was something unlike any known aircraft that i have ever seen before. i am a veteran of the us army with 9 years active duty and nothing in my experiences have i ever seen anything like what my wife and i witnessed that night on march 13, 2015. the sphere continued flying in a north easterly direction and continued making changes in flight path until it disappeared from sight. i had left my phone in the house otherwise i might had been able to capture the sighting in a video! the total amount of time that the sphere was seen in the sky was about three to three and a half minutes.
content.summary: Bright blue flourescent glowing sphere that flew erratically at low level in a ne direction then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Viewed many human like people and numerous craft of many different sizes. some of the occupants came into our house but they were more curious than anything. i kept hearing people in our cellar and went to investigate. when i did, to my surprise, there were males, females, children, older male and female counterparts which i assumed are parents of the male and females of the groups. i observed them outside in the back yard which goes into a field. those people seemed to rise up and down our pine trees in our yard. in order to board the big crafts, they would rise up the pine tree which was 50 or more feet in size, like as if they were wearing and anti gravity device. in order to get into our home, they seemed to have some way of physically manipulating our windows locks and to raise up the windows without handling them. they seemed to be friendly but were cautious about revealing themselves to me. it took time for that to happen and when it did i met  an unusual looking male occupant. when they spoke they talked at a very low level, now if i remember their lips weren't moving.

i have been talking with a man from mufon in manchester, ct by the name of steve, but i don't remember his last name and lost his number and contact info when my computer crashed. i need to get a hold of him and he needs to gather all this information. i cannot type all of it, and there are problems with the aliens. they seem to think i had not looked after one of the children who died according to one of the grieving aliens. its a long story and mufon needs to gather this information before the come and get me!!! i'm fairly alarmed at the prospect. i will explain all when mufon contact me...Please hurry...I don't know how long i have...This is all true to best of knowledge and experience with them. 

i could not get any photos as they would come and go quickly, and besides the camera on my phone would drive them away...
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.features: Window(s), Patterned Surface, Appendage(s), Louvres, Wings, Other
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Way too many to say here.

content.detailedDescription: Coming back home with my brother in law, around 9:15 pm, i saw á brillant moon with some clouds passing by, and  i took some pictures,  i did not noticed any object át thát moment, the next da ya when i was reviwwing  the pictures, i noticed the greeish sphere in one of them it look like was passing by when i sow the other 3 pictures. my brother in low took also a picture at the same time he was about 15 féet from mi but diden't show the object.
content.summary: N back home with my brother in low, at about 9:15 pm,  l  saw the moon over the top  mi head and decides to take some pictures.  i noticed a greenish sphere  nextt day  when  l was  reviewing  the  pictures. i

content.detailedDescription: Two bright yellow lights above the airport. i was on the ramp north of the c concourse looking up and noticed what appearred to be a satellite. there was minimal cloud cover that night. the base of the clouds were 9,500 feet with a ceiling of 12,000 feet. here is what really caught my attention...The light was moving through the clouds illuminating them. this light was moving was bound. the light then dissappeared and another light appeared in the same area moving south bound. at their altitude the sppeds were less than 100 mph based on the spped of west jet flying north at 35,750 feet. these lights were well below that aircraft. best part four f-16's from hill were on scene in about ten minutes. the 16's were in pursuit of these lights. these was about 9:30 pm. the same light appeared last night and moved above the airport also moving south then east throught clouds. total viewing time for both events was about 10 minutes. the lights are about the same size of the lights on the hangers at hill which ware visible from the airport and parts of slc.
content.summary: Lights over the salt lake int. airport

content.detailedDescription: This cloud ufo went to the left of a bill board to a another and went down to pieces and dissapeared into the air it was white no crash i was looking out the window.
content.summary: I was looking out the window and i saw a cloud ufo at preisbytirine hospltal in dallas

content.detailedDescription: Came home from a farm auction about 8:30, went to close the barn up and put the chickens to roost. looked over our field and saw a huge what appeared to be a fire. it was really windy so i got alarmed that it might catch the whole area on fire. at that time i saw the red fire glowing it was so bright it shined above the trees and you could see like smoke billowing up. i ran and told my wife and daughter there was a fire and i had to go check on it. i came back out less then 2 minutes later and ran to my 4 wheeler and looked over and could not see the fire and couldn't figure how that could be possible, i grabbed a pair of binoculars from the tractor and looked through and saw what appeared to be red hot ambers and coals in a diagonal angle left being the high point coming down to the right. i jumped on my 4 wheeler and went across my field to the fence. i could still see the fire under the tree branches. but it was going in and out but was still there. everything seemed odd at that point, i couldn't figure how they got that fire under control so quick and i hadn't seen anyone over there nor could i hear anyone. then off to the left i saw a light from a flash light maybe shining it down towards where the fire was then it turned away and i saw red light. a couple planes flew by and i swore i saw one out in the air behind the tree when i first saw the fire so i know there must of been other witnesses to this. anyway i yelled over to the people and said hey what are you all doing over there. i got no response but a little more movement and they shine the flashlight over towards my direction and i spotlighted them back but could not make out any shape. i then saw huge flashes of white light in the sky over behind where i saw the flashlights like lightning flashes that stay in the clouds. after that i saw nothing, the fire was gone the flashlights were gone and it just seemed creepy but i climbed under the barbwire determined to see where the fire was. i was in water shoes with no socks walking in palmettos which are like snake houses so i didn't go real far. i felt like there was something there but could see nothing or maybe i was just a little freaked out. but i called out again and asked who was out here but got no reply. i was out there a little over an hour. i looked back to the location that i had originally saw the fire to make sure i was in the right spot and i was but saw no smoke no smouldering ambers. so i decided i would come to look in the morning. this morning i went over there and drove everywhere on that side and up where i saw the flashlights or whatever they were and found nothing. i drove my 4 wheeler up and down the location of the fire and not a trace of a fire. thats when i was sure something strange had happened. i know there is a couple pilots out there that saw something here last night.
content.summary: Thought it was a huge field/tree fire saw sparks glowing ambers, then people shining lights off to the left

content.detailedDescription:
Wendesday march 11, 2015 while driving down to the va haospital for a follow up on my post op surgery.  the wife and i were driving on highway 41 southbond.  as we got near exit 60 which is the exit for hartford, i notice a huge bright light about 35 to 50 miles away due south.
thinking to myself and confriming that it was morning already or should i say the crack of dawn.  the sun was up from the east, above that were dark clouds, then you could see the blue sky.  this huge bright light (ufo) was at lease half a mile above the dark clouds. the object (ufo) was totally stationary.
i told my wife, isnt that interesting look at that bright light ahead.  my wife saw it and then it started to flicker rapidly for 30 to 40 secounds.  then it just vanished almost like folding in on itself.  this object (ufo) was huge.  there is noway to tell how big this object was do to the distance we were from it.
i then call my brother on my cell-phone he lives in milwaukee, i told him of this sighting.  this is not the first sighting nor do i think it will be the last.
content.summary: Ufo sighted march 11, 2015

content.detailedDescription:
After dinner at tinys restaurant, state st., utica, ny., i entered my car along with a friend and drove south on state st toward his home on kirkland st., when to my left i saw 3 red-orange bright lights with what looked like two small white lights at the outer edges of the red light. jokingly i said to my friend, "look, ufos"...To which he replied, "they're helicoptors".. i pulled the car over, parked and got out. i heard no helicoptors motor noise, and said, "bullshit those aren't helicoptors. 
    the objects were traveling ne not in any line but random formation, and over very slowly and my viewpoint placed them south of, (to the right of) munson williams proctor museum that was nearly directly to my left ( east).
     i reached for my cell phone in my coat pocket and snapped two quick pictures, then as soon as i took the second picture, i looked down to my cell to switch it to video and they slowly but steadily faded out, all at once. you can see in the two pics that they are starting to fade, and tho the pics were taken immediately one after the other, they are just visible in the second pic. my friend, at first skeptical, could not believe that they were gone, asking several times, "where'd they go? where the hell did they go?"
     i felt a strange emptiness, almost a hollow felling at what i might have just witnessed. my friend was stumped. i drove him home and that was it. all over in less than a minute
content.summary: 3 red orange lights flew in formation then blinked out

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog for a walk on the beach as it was a clear mild evening. air was strangely still and so we're the waves. noticed a bright ball of light coming closer from the north over the shore towards me at approx 2215 hours. it stopped abover and in front of me and was making a humming noise. i first thought it was a helicopter drone but all of a sudden a white thin beam of light hit me, and i could see this person in front of me. i felt all weak and light headed and a pain developed in my behind. the figure was neither male of female but it was holding something in its left hand that looked like a ladel spoon. i could hear my dog barking but in the distance and then nothing. no sound or light it felt like i was in an empty space suspended in air. the pain in my behind and rectum area got more instense and then it just stopped. i blacked out and came to sitting holding my head on the ground .The dog was sat by me looking at the sea wagging her tale. i checked my watch and it was now just a minute after 11pm. i had lost approx 45 minutes of time! i felt weak still so got up and went home. the sphere had gone and i could here sheep and calling and the waves as normal. when i got home i checked my body and behind, and i had blood and a clear substance on my jeans that was not there before. i put a sample of this in the cooler just in case someone can test it. i have no illness and have never seen or experienced this in my life before...
content.summary: Bright sphere hovered above then landed on ground with contact

content.detailedDescription:
I was between the age of 12-14 and i can't even remember the time of year but i know it wasn't winter.  i'm writing this now because i've been desperate to know if anyone else has ever experienced something similar and because i've only just recently put together a number of odd events that have happened in my life and there is a possibility it links back to the event in the early 80s.   

it was sometime after midnight, i was asleep in my bed in a bedroom at the end of a hallway that leads to the stairs descending to the front door.  directly beside my room at a 90 degree is my mother's bedroom and she always falls asleep with the bedroom light on and the door open. the light from her room shines into the hallway and slightly into my room as my door was about 4 inches open.

i woke up to a strange sound coming the stairs, similar to what a 45 vinyl record would sound like on 33.  i use that analogy because we listened to a lot of vinyl in those years. i can't describe the sound but it wasn't music. there was another sound like a ski jacket rubbing up against the wall and as i could hear it approaching my room, i became terrified.  i brought the blankets up to my nose and peered out over them as the object hovered at my door. all i could see was something black there and light coming from my mother's room glowed below it, where you would expect lower legs and feet.  it was probably 4 or 5 feet high.  it only hovered for maybe 10 seconds and it changed direction and into my mother's bedroom for maybe another 10 seconds.  i could hear it moving and i was too scared to move to help my mother (a shame i have carried with me ever since).

it changed direction again and i could hear it move into the kitchen next to my mothers room for maybe another 10 seconds. eventually, it moved back out into the hallway and down the stairs.  at that point i flew out of bed and woke my mother in a panic trying to explain to her what i experienced.  she got up and we walked into the kitchen together.  every kitchen cupboard, top and bottom was open, every kitchen chair was out of place, yet i heard none of this activity while the object was in the kitchen and it happened in seconds. we went down the hall and looking down the stairs found the door open.  upon further observation, we discovered the door was still locked. 

years later 2000/01: i'm in my early 30s and i am the single mother of 2 girls aged 13/14 and (wow, i just made the connection that my oldest daughter was possibly the same age i was when weird things started happening again) my youngest was 6/7, renting the top floor of a house in victoria, vancouver island.  at least 3 or 4 times a night, i would wake up and find my back door wide open and still locked.  everyone thought it was my x-boyfriend trying to make my life difficult. he denied this and offered to stay with me to see if it would happened while he was there.  it did, and he stood there in absolute surprise at the wide open locked back door.  i thought maybe i had a stalker or something and reported it to the police.  i then moved me and my two girls across town to live temporarily with a friend while i tried to figure out what was going on.  my bedroom was beside the front door. within 2 weeks, it started happening again.  i ended up getting back together with my boyfriend and within weeks moved into his townhouse (shortly before 911.  it stopped happening.  

years later 2013/14 - i moved in with my fiancé in nanaimo vancouver island, now i find the back door to the kitchen wide open and locked except down, it's daytime when it's happening. i work in an office in the basement of our home and have come upstairs for a coffee and found that door open and unlocked.  all these years i thought i had a stalker, but one night while staying at a friends house over night (my headquarters is in victoria) i woke up to that similar sound i heard as a teenager and immediately regressed and was terrified.  turned out it was my friend's son coming home and music was playing on his cell phone while he was walking up the stairs to the house (my bedroom window was just above it and open slightly to let in fresh air).  before i realized it was him, i forced myself out of bed and down the hall stair to the front door, praying i wouldn't find it open and locked (or something hovering there).  it was my friend's son. thank goodness.  but that was when i made the connection of all the times i found the doors open and locked to when i was a teenager.  

maybe it's not connected at all, but i have been left somewhat psychologically scared by all that happened in the early 80s and would love some answers.

l
content.summary: I was woken by a strange noise in the house.. like a recorded sound in very slow speed (a 45 vinyl record on speed 33) it hovered at my bedroom door

content.detailedDescription: We wish to remain anonymous, please. wife and i were at home watching tv. through our back bay window, we saw what looked like a low, slow flying plane with bright lights coming in our direction from the nne in a straight path. we went outside with binoculars and as the lights veered-off slightly from the straight path over our house, we saw that there were two distinct objects. they made no sound whatsoever and flew as slow, or slower than a small single engine aircraft. the larger one with very bright lights was boomerang shaped with a yellow-orange pulsating light in "front" with two white lights on each side of the yellow-orange at equal distances that also pulsated from bright to faint. the pulsing was not sequential or in any order. in front of this one and moving slightly faster were two smaller red lights in a diagonal configuration, the leading red light lower than the trailing, and flashed similar to an airplane but not sequential. the objects made a sweeping turn from a westerly direction to the sw, and at that point could see a third very faint red light on the smaller object at a point what seemed to be between the other two but did not blink, so it seemed to give the object a triangular shape. as they passed away from our house to the sw then s over the town of elma, the smaller object seemed to take on a slight outline of a triangle. it was clear that the larger object was boomerang shape. as they moved further away, there was a very faint "whoosh" sound similar to rushing air but nothing like a prop or jet engine, that lasted maybe 3 or 4 seconds. it did not seem like the objects made any banking motion like a conventional aircraft, but the larger one flew with the right-side slightly higher than the left side, even in straight flight. they flew without any speed change until out of sight. about an hour later, they were seen again well-off in the distance to the ne of our home, moving from left to right with the smaller one behind the larger. we watched them for about 20 minutes making the same sweeping flight path, coming toward our area, then the smaller object made a sudden "jump" to be in front of the larger one. they then made a quick change of direction back to the ese and disappeared over the capital state forest. the next day we saw on an elma, wa facebook page that other residents of the town also saw what we did. unfortunately there are no photos or video. at the time of the first sighting we thought the lights were from military aircraft, until we realized they made no sound, were not shaped like and did not fly like a normal aircraft (airplane or helicopter).
content.summary: Two distinct objects, seen twice traveling different directions from different locations

content.detailedDescription: I work offshore in the oilfield in angola. we were working outside when one of my technicians said he seen some strange lights in the sky. we saw about 8 lights (3 were in a close triangle shape) at different elevations all around a 220-240 heading. all were around the same brightness and were flickering white, red and blue which lasted about 30 minutes then were just gone. we did not see exactly when they disappeared. we were not watching continuously. i did not take any pictures as we would have to get a permit to take pictures and takes a while to get. we are in block 37 off the coast of luanda angola.
content.summary: Lights in the sky offshore in angola

content.detailedDescription: At 7.33 pm on wednesday 4th march 2015 i came out of the house with my girlfriend to go to the local shops it was a clear night as i walked towards the car an amazing orange vertical light caught my eye i quickly told my girlfriend to look at it so aswell it seemed to be high up but towering and long vertical and was pulsating getting brighter then fading and brighter again i got my phone out to film it but it couldnt pick it up like the human eye so got my girlfriend to try her iphone it could only just make it out but just too dark on the phone , it was,nt a chinese lantern as ive seen them before , it was,nt a comet or shooting star as this was just staying in one place and was glowing and it was,nt the northern lights as they are multi coloured and dancing lights ..This was orange vertical and could,nt see any other lights or objects near to the tower of orange light .. we watched it until it faded to what looked like a star moving away, , when i looked at it and it just felt like it was,nt of this world ..It was something me and my girlfriend will never forget .. , the temperature that night was not that cold so i rule out ice crystals .. i may never know what it was but feel lucky to have seen it , ive now got video not very good but hope that it can be checked because im sure i can here some noise in the background  on one of the videos that is,nt traffic also ive uploaded  a screenshot from the video  ive used my mobile phone photo editor to zoom in and some type of object can be seen in the centre .. this is case 63778 i am available for any other information as i wish to know what ive seen
content.summary: 4th march 2015  7.33pm  orange vertical light over ingleby barwick teesside north east england

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i set outside every chance we can to watch meteors and there was a lot of activity last night we saw over 6 or so. my wife then looked over to her left and at the tree top of one of our trees was a glowing like perfectly round object.At first it was very bright it was about the size of our outside table. it had a star like object inside of it that moved along with it. as it moved slowly in a very horizontal line to the north it grew in size and there were no clouds at all in the area, it just appeared out of nowhere! as it was moving it grew larger in size slowly and on the very outside edge there was another star like object that went into the center of the other star object. our dog [item moved/cms/nd] who also sits outside at night with us took off under our trailer so what ever it was it scared her. my wife went into the house to get our sons to show them what we were seeing and they also were mind blown by what we saw. this is not the first time we have seen something out of the ordinary but it is the first time we had seen something of this nature. it finally disappeared to where we could not see it anymore. from here on out we are going to try to film anything we see like this, unfortunately all our cameras are out of date so we could not get it on film. this is truly something not of this planet! i can draw you a sketch and send it via email if your interested in looking at it, just contact us back and we would be more than happy to do so. thanks
content.summary: Started as round glowing ball with object inside moving east to north

content.detailedDescription:
1: walking 
2: the lights 
3: a plane
4: it flew over our heads and stayed in the same place hovering and going backwards and forwards , there where lights all round the middle 
5: shocked disbelief 
6: it flew away and disappeared
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flew over our  heads

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in twin lakes village near rathdrum idaho and saw this orange object in the south night sky approximately at 45 degrees.  the object was moving slowly from west to east and when it got to the far east it sped up and disappeared.  i went into my house at twin lakes and came out approximately 10 minutes later and the object was back again and repeated the same thing.  i stayed to see if it would come back for another 15 minutes but it did not return.  the color and appearance was sun like and did not resemble a light from a plane or other night flying device that i have ever seen.  it was not star like in color, but was of bright yellow and orange with irregular edges with the appearance of being on fire.  i took several pictures with my iphone of which two were visible, one is very faint as it was in the southeast as it was about to disappear and the other is very bright and represents the object well.  the night was dark and the quality because of the distance the object was from me is not real good.  i have not explanation for what the object was.  i was very curious but not alarmed or fearful at the sighting.
content.summary: A sunlike glowing object a bit irregular in shape on the edges moving west to east.  repeted twice.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in fair less hills bucks county, when i looked up in the sky, i was standing between two apartment buildings, i saw like 10 objects floating over head, i took out my phone and snapped a couple of pictures, to me they looked like a v shape but upside down and the bottom was glowing orange-ish yellow but i never heard a sound. they were moving slower then i would think something can fly. i thought it looked like a secret or unknown aircraft.
i never saw anything like this before and lost track of them as they flew over the buildings.
the date is approx, but i should have it on actual pics... if you need any more info. i would sure be able to show you where it was....
content.summary: To me it looked like candy corn, but silver and a yellowish glow at the bottom.

content.detailedDescription: As i locked up after work, i notice a white light to the west with a red pulsating below it. took my phone to start recording video. it had a larger white light on the front(it was shaped like a triangle with the corners not connected) and 3 white lights in a triangle formation with a red pulsating light in the center. my phone picked up white light at first but as it was overhead only the red light can be seen. i don't understand because it was so clearly seen with the naked eye. it was very big. it floated right over west to east in a straight line without any noise.
content.summary: Large triangle floated right overhead and took video

content.detailedDescription: In the date of morning i'm walking in street. that time the moon was in sky. i saw the object like squere shape it flying very smoothly and gone far away. after few sec it goes many distence and it disappered.
content.summary: When i saw it, it was smoothly fly. after some time it disappeard.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs last night, when i saw something in the sky at 135 degrees south-east. at first i thought it was a shooting star (i saw one just a couple of days ago, i think) but when it started to (what seemed) change direction randomly i changed my mind. i'ts difficult for something in a state of free fall to change direction randomly. since the only thing that can change the direction of planets and such is gravity, im pretty sure it was a ufo. but it did'nt seem to move with any purpose. wich also leads me to believe that it was'nt man-made either.


the object had several lights that seemed to pulsate in a random fashion.
it was very far away, so i cant give any more details.

i first noticed the pulsating lights. my thought was at first that it was a dying star, but when i noticed that it moved i thought shooting star.

i lost sight of the object when i went inside to get a camera. when i got outside again, the object was gone.

im sorry that i cant give any more details.
content.summary: It was like a shooting star that changed direction randomly.

content.detailedDescription:
There was a stationary "cloud" above us outside, to the west there was an orangeish orb sitting on tree line. got binaculars to see and "cloud" dissapated while orb went vertical side side then flew north/nw.
felt like i was being watched, not sure if both had something to do with the other, but i know what planes,jets, helicopters and military aircraft look and sound like. this was neither. hanford is about an hour north. never seen anything like it.
content.summary: There was a stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding my 2006 suzuki burgman 400 to my part time job riding east on a landis valley road approx. at 11:30 pm. to my right were apts and to my left was a church i was planing to turn left into the church to do some custodial work. in front of me was a bridge that crossed over rt. 222, a major highway. ahead of me at the 12 0'clock position above the trees was a big ball of light that was descending rapidly and it disappeared below the tree line. i estimated it to be approx. about 1 mile away max. it made no noise and there was no sound of a crash. it was no aircraft of any kind. it was not any kind of firework. it was no bird of any kind. it was not a hot air balloon at all. i have no idea what it was at all. there is the county airport about 4 miles away. there was no aircraft flying around that i could see or hear. when i parked my scooter and went inside the building i was listening for any kind of emergency sirens that might be in the area, but there was none. i did not bother to investigate it.

i was a very odd situation. a big ball of light that was descending rapidly that made no noise and there was no crashing sound. i could not identify what the object was. there was no emergency sirens at all after the event. 
so what ever it was did not crash or land. the event did not last long.
content.summary: It was a big ball of light descending .
